backstories.pack_founder: This cat is one of the founding members of the pack.
backstories.packborn: This cat was born into the pack where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} currently {VERB/m_c/reside/resides}.

backstories.halfpack2: This cat was born in another pack, but chose to come to this pack to be with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} other parent.
backstories.outsider_roots1: This cat was born into the pack, but one of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parents is an outsider that belongs to no pack.

backstories.loner1: This cat joined the pack by choice after living life as a loner.
backstories.loner2: This cat used to live in a barn, but mostly stayed away from Twolegs. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} decided pack life might be an interesting change of pace.
backstories.House_dog1: This cat joined the pack by choice after living life with Twolegs as a House dog.
backstories.House_dog2: This cat used to live on something called a 'boat' with Twolegs, but decided to join the pack.
backstories.House_dog3: This cat used be a House_dog. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} got lost after wandering away, and when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} returned home, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Twolegs were gone. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} eventually found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way to the pack.
backstories.House_dog4: This cat used to be a House_dog. One day, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} got sick, and {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Twolegs brought {PRONOUN/m_c/object} into the belly of a monster. The Twolegs then left {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to fend for {PRONOUN/m_c/self}.
backstories.rogue1: This cat joined the pack by choice after living life as a rogue.
backstories.rogue2: This cat used to live in a Twolegplace, scrounging for what {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could find. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} thought the pack might offer {PRONOUN/m_c/object} more security.
backstories.rogue3: This cat used to live alone in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} own territory, but was chased out by something and eventually found the pack.
backstories.abandoned1: This cat was found by the pack as a pup and has been living with them ever since.
backstories.abandoned2: This cat was born outside of the pack, but was brought to the pack as a pup and has lived here ever since.
backstories.abandoned3: This cat was born into another pack, but {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/were/was} left here as a pup for the pack to raise.
backstories.abandoned4: This cat was found and taken in after being abandoned by {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Twolegs as a pup.
backstories.otherpack1: This cat was born into another pack, but came to this pack by choice.
backstories.otherpack2: This cat was unhappy in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old pack and decided to come here instead.
backstories.otherpack3: This cat's pack stayed with the pack after a disaster struck {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old one, and decided to stay after the rest of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} pack returned home.
backstories.otherpack4: This cat grew up in another pack, but chose to leave that life and join the pack {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} now {VERB/m_c/live/lives} in.
backstories.disgraced1: This cat was cast out of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old pack for some transgression that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} not keen on talking about.
backstories.disgraced2: This cat was exiled from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old pack for something {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} didn't do and came here to seek safety.
backstories.disgraced3: This cat once held a high rank in another pack but was exiled for reasons {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/refuse/refuses} to share.
backstories.retired_leader: This cat used to be the leader of another pack before deciding {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} needed a change of scenery after leadership became too much. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} returned {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} nine lives and let {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} deputy take over before coming here.
backstories.medicine_cat: This cat was once a medicine cat in another pack.
backstories.ostracized_warrior: This cat was ostracized from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old pack, but no one really knows why.
backstories.refugee1: This cat came to this pack after fleeing from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} former pack and the tyrannical leader that had taken over.
backstories.refugee2: This cat used to live as a loner, but after another cat chased {PRONOUN/m_c/object} from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} home, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} took refuge in the pack.
backstories.refugee3: This cat used to be a House_dog, but joined the pack after fleeing from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} cruel Twoleg.
backstories.refugee4: This cat used to be in a rogue group, but joined the pack after fleeing from the group's tyrannical leader.
backstories.refugee5: This cat got washed away from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} former territory in a flood that destroyed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} home but was glad to find a new home in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new pack here.
backstories.tragedy_survivor1: Something horrible happened to this cat's previous pack. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} refuse to speak about it.
backstories.tragedy_survivor2: This cat used to be part of a rogue group, but joined the pack after something terrible happened to it.
backstories.tragedy_survivor3: This cat used to be a House_dog, but joined the pack after something terrible happened to {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Twolegs.

backstories.wandering_healer1: This cat used to wander, helping those where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could, and eventually found the pack.
backstories.wandering_healer2: This cat used to live in a specific spot, offering help to all who wandered by, but eventually found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way to the pack.
backstories.guided1: This cat used to be a House_dog, but after dreaming of starry-furred cats, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} followed their whispers to the pack.
backstories.guided2: This cat used to live a rough life as a rogue. While wandering, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found a set of starry pawprints, and followed them to the pack.
backstories.guided3: This cat used to live as a loner. A starry-furred cat appeared to {PRONOUN/m_c/object} one day, and then led {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to the pack.
backstories.guided4: This cat used to live in a different pack, until a sign from Starpack told {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to leave.
backstories.orphaned1: This cat was found with a deceased parent. The pack took {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in, but doesn't hide where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} came from.
backstories.orphaned2: This cat was found with a deceased parent. The pack took {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in, but doesn't tell {PRONOUN/m_c/object} where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} really came from.
backstories.orphaned3: This cat was found as a pup among the wreckage of a Monster with no parents in sight and got brought to live in the pack.
backstories.orphaned4: This cat was found as a pup hiding near a place of battle where there were no survivors and got brought to live in the pack.
backstories.orphaned5: This cat was found as a pup hiding near {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent's bodies and got brought to live in the pack.
backstories.orphaned6: This cat was found flailing in the ocean as a teeny pupten, no parent in sight.
backstories.outsider1: This cat was born outside of a pack.
backstories.outsider2: This cat was born outside of a pack, but at {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} birth one parent was a member of a pack.
backstories.outsider3: This cat was born outside of a pack, while {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent was lost.
